settings.text: Home / Road Bikes

settings.title: Save up to £289.98*
settings.content:
Free Carbon Race Handlebar & Free Shipping

Unlock the offer in checkout

settings.text: Every cyclists wants a bike that combines aero advantage with the lightness and comfort for long days in the saddle. The Handsling A1R0evo & A1R0evoS delivers on all fronts. Each bike is built to the riders size and specification creating a personalised performance experience.

settings.title: A1R0evo Details
settings.content:
The A1R0evo is the ultimate carbon fibre disc brake road bike. The in house designed A1R0evo frame combines these key features:

  • Real world fast - wind cheating profiles of truncated aerofoil tube shapes
  • Power transfer enhancement - asymmetric stays, oversized head tube and bottom bracket shell
  • Control in all conditions - asymmetric forks to withstand twisting forces under braking
  • Do-it-all road frame - the frame is stiff yet still comfortable, aided by a unique tapered seattube design and being able to fit tyres up to 32mm wide
  • Race proven - used by 3 pro-continental teams to win multiple races
  • Toray T800 carbon - advanced carbon lay-up for lighter weight, increased stiffness and ultimate performance

settings.title: A1R0evoS Details
settings.content:
The A1R0evoS is the ultimate super-lightweight carbon fibre disc brake road bike. The A1R0evo is the ultimate carbon fibre disc brake road bike. The in house designed A1R0evo frame combines these key features:

  • Real world fast - wind cheating profiles of truncated aerofoil tube shapes
  • Power transfer enhancement - asymmetric stays, oversized head tube and bottom bracket shell
  • Control in all conditions - asymmetric forks to withstand twisting forces under braking
  • Do-it-all road frame - the frame is stiff yet still comfortable, aided by a unique tapered seattube design and being able to fit tyres up to 32mm wide
  • Race proven - used by 3 pro-continental teams to win multiple races
  • Toray T1100 carbon - advanced carbon lay-up for lighter weight, increased stiffness and ultimate performance

settings.text: Live bike image is for illustrative purposes only

settings.title: Once you’ve completed your purchase, our team will contact you to confirm the finer details of your custom build, including frame size, integrated bar/stem, crank length, and gear ratios. We ensure that every aspect of your bike is fine-tuned for your specific needs, giving you the confidence to perform at your best.

Trustpilot

settings.title: Delivered to you in 4-6 weeks
settings.content:
Each bike is custom built to rider size and spec. Certain frames are painted to order before being built into full bikes which can affect lead times.

Easy Assembly: From out the box, attach your seat post and wheels and you're ready to ride.

settings.title: Multiple ways to pay
settings.content: We accept multiple payment types. We also offer cycle to work schemes or 0% interest free payments with 25% deposit.

settings.title: Your Bike, Your Fit
settings.content:
We understand how crucial it is to achieve the perfect bike fit. Unlike other bike brands, we don’t just offer off-the-shelf bikes. Instead, we ensure your frame size is precisely matched to you before starting your bike build.

Simply upload your bike fit directly on the product page or provide your measurements after placing your order. We will then be in touch to discuss your fitting requirements.

settings.title: Financing with one of our partners
settings.content:
We understand how crucial it is to achieve the perfect bike fit. Unlike other bike brands, we don’t just offer off-the-shelf bikes. Instead, we ensure your frame size is precisely matched to you before starting your bike build.

Simply upload your bike fit directly on the product page or provide your measurements after placing your order. We will then be in touch to discuss your fitting requirements.

settings.title: Shipping and Delivery
settings.content:
• Your custom-built bike will be delivered in around 4-6 weeks*, depending on your chosen options.

• You’ll receive regular updates throughout the build process.

• UK: VAT included. Ships via DPD, FedEx or DHL with tracking.

• EU: Taxes and Duties are included in product price. Orders are shipped DDP (Delivered Duty Paid)

• International: Shipped DAP – taxes and duties not included. Shipping calculated at checkout.

• Tracking info will be provided once dispatched.

*Lead times may vary based on specification.

settings.title: Quick Assembly
settings.content:
We’ve simplified the assembly process to get you on the road faster. When your bike arrives, it’s 95% assembled, with only a few final touches needed:

• Insert the seat post.

• Fit the wheels.

settings.title: Build Process
settings.content:
As each bike is custom-built for the rider, it takes time to ensure everything is perfectly tuned to your needs. Here’s what to expect:

1. Custom Fit and Configuration

Your bike is tailored to your exact specifications, including frame size, components, and selected options, ensuring a perfect fit.

• 2. Paint Queue

The frame is sent to the paint queue for your chosen colour and finish.

• 3. Regular Updates

You’ll be kept informed throughout the build process.

• 4. Final Assembly and Inspection

Each bike is assembled and inspected to meet our high standards before shipping or collection.

For more details check out our Buying Process page.

settings.title: Save up to 42% on your Handsling bike
settings.content:
Save up to 42% on your Handsling bike through the Cycle to Work scheme! This government-backed initiative allows you to purchase a bike tax-free, spreading the cost over monthly installments.

How It Works:

1. Check if your employer is registered with a Cycle to Work provider.

2. Use your voucher or deposit £300.00 to secure the purchase of your Handsling bike.

3. Save on income tax and National Insurance contributions.

Key Benefits:

• Save up to 42% on your new bike.

• Spread the cost with no upfront payment.

• Enjoy commuting on a bike built for performance.

Learn more and see how much you could save by visiting our Cycle to Work page.

settings.title: Discuss your new bike on webchat or contact us if you have any question:
settings.content: Tel. 01420 612700 or email sales@handslingbikes.com

settings.author: Road.cc on the Handsling A1R0evo Shimano Ultegra Di2 R8100
settings.content: "A high-end, no-compromise road bike that delivers stiffness and comfort in equal measure." 9/10

settings.content: Pair text with an image to focus on your chosen product, collection, or blog post. Add details on availability, style, or even provide a review.
It's fast in racing, but also handles really well, which is important when I’m cornering in a criterium or road race
Great quality frameset which is outstanding to ride. Speed & comfort rarely come together on a road bike but my A1R0evo has it mastered.
The bike (itself) is fast, it climbs, its stable, it handles brilliantly, inspires confidence at speed and is comfortable; for an aero bike anyway.
The bike is super smooth but also has really sharp handling and just feels fast.
Stiff, nimble and really quick, yet more than comfortable…..that frame is seriously top! All the set up was spot on; using 28’s tyres perfect for the gnarly Yorkshire tarmac,
I was free wheeling when others where pedalling lol it just cut through the air! Roll on next event!
The bike - A1RO Evo Ultegra Di2 is a dream! It's fast without being twitchy, comfortable on long rides and climbs brilliantly too. Puts a smile on my face every time I ride it!

settings.title: Customer Reviews
settings.content: Check out more reviews of the Handsling A1R0evo on Trustpilot, Google or Facebook.
Read the Road.cc review of the A1R0evo here

settings.liquid: Trustpilot
Trustpilot

settings.title: Frame Production
settings.content: Manufactured using Toray T800 carbon, one of the strongest, toughest carbons on the market internal EPS internal moulds used for increased carbon compaction, eliminating small imperfections to make the frame tougher, lighter, and stiffer rigorous, destructive testing procedure to surpass ISO standards.

settings.title: Frame Design
settings.content:
The frame was designed in-house from scratch to achieve real world aerodynamic performance combined with the toughness to sustain minor knocks.

Handsling are in the fortunate position of being able to control all aspects of production and actually own the moulds which we use to make our bikes.

settings.title: UCI-Approved
settings.content: Tested and developed in race conditions, the UCI-approved A1R0evo excels in multiple scenarios - from tight city centre streets to steep mountain passes to cruising on a club ride.

settings.title: Comfort
settings.content:
Frame accepts 32mm tyres, increasing comfort levels and opening up all sorts of possibilities.

Larger tyres enhance comfort so frame can be built with more lateral stiffnessUnique aero seattube shape which thins to a standard diameter seatpost.

Seatpost is an aero, truncated D-shape and utilises a clever, non-stick seat clamp expander bolt hidden under the top tube

settings.title: Tailor-fitted
settings.content:
Bikes are assembled in Handsling's UK workshop according to rider size and spec, including high-end components from Shimano, SRAM, and Campagnolo, and your choice of wheels and finishing kit.

We offer Remote Tailored Sizing so you can get the best fit.

Learn more

settings.title: Frameset Features
settings.content:
• Integrated headset bearings
  • Aero, interlocking headset spacers
  • Dedicated aero seatpost
  • Handsling superlight thru axles 142x12mm and 100x12mm

* Handsling handlebars sold separately: 

  • Handsling Race Integrated one piece carbon stem and handlebar (either 9, 10, 11, 12cm stem with either 38, 40, 42cm bar)

settings.title: Stiff, Aero & Lightweight.
settings.content:
The Handsling A1R0evoS (pron. aero-evo) is the ultimate carbon road frame for those seeking to build a lightweight superbike

Using the same moulds as for the A1R0evo, the A1R0evoS utilises Toray T1100 carbon fibre, which requires less material to achieve the same level of frame stiffness, thereby resulting in a lighter frame that is still as stiff as our race winning T800 series frame

settings.title: Sizing Guide
settings.content: Finding the right size bike can be a bit overwhelming, but don't worry - we're here to help. The right size bike will ensure a comfortable and safe ride, so it's important to take some time to find the perfect fit.

settings.title: Dimensions
settings.content: Carbon frames are manufactured in the Far East using moulds that are owned by Handsling. This provides full control over the production process and makes each and every model exclusive to the brand.

settings.title: BUILT JUST FOR YOU
settings.content: Every rider deserves a bike tailored to their unique riding style and performance goals. We offer personalised performance service for our high-performance carbon bikes.

settings.title: CARBON T800 TORAY
settings.content: High tensile and high modulus carbon fiber with patented Nanoalloy Technology for extreme performances.

settings.title: Bike Buying Consultation
settings.content: From sizing and frame colour, to wheels and components, your Handsling bike is custom fit to your personal requirements.

settings.title: Tailored Bike Fitting
settings.content: A properly fitting bike is essential for achieving peak performance and comfort on the road, track or trail. That's why we offer tailored bike fitting for our high-performance carbon bikes.

Spread the cost of your new bike with monthly payments at 0% interest*

*T&Cs apply. Splitit never adds any interest. Only available on purchases over £2,000.00.
We have a range of test bikes available. Book a test ride today at our UK workshop, or schedule a video call with our sales team.
